title: Looking for Common T210 and T212-2
author: Bocabirdman

posts.post_title: Looking for Common T210 and T212-2
posts.post_content:
Hi All,

Looking to fill some holes in my Red Border pile and my 1910 Obak pile. SGC30-40 or PSA 2-3 or the raw equivalent would be perfect. I have too few to bother listing what I  DO have so please.....just let me know what you have available and chances are pretty good we can get something done.......Thanks in advance to the hundreds of guys that shall respond...:):D:rolleyes:.....Mike
